question.text: What is the incorrect statement regarding two given complexes <math> <mrow> <mfenced close="]" open="["> <mrow> <mtext>Cr</mtext><mfenced> <mrow> <msub> <mtext>H</mtext> <mtext>2</mtext> </msub> <msub> <mtext>O</mtext> <mtext>6</mtext> </msub> </mrow> </mfenced><msub> <mrow> <mtext>Cl</mtext></mrow> <mtext>3</mtext> </msub> </mrow> </mfenced><mtext> </mtext><mfenced> <mtext>A</mtext> </mfenced></mrow> </math> and <math> <mrow> <mfenced close="]" open="["> <mrow> <mtext>Cr</mtext><msub> <mrow> <mfenced> <mrow> <msub> <mrow> <mtext>NH</mtext></mrow> <mtext>3</mtext> </msub> </mrow> </mfenced></mrow> <mn>6</mn> </msub> </mrow> </mfenced><msub> <mrow> <mtext>Cl</mtext></mrow> <mtext>3</mtext> </msub> <mfenced> <mtext>B</mtext> </mfenced></mrow><mo>,</mo> </math>  which are violet and yellow coloured respectively?

options.text: Both are paramagnetic with three unpaired electrons

<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><msub><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math> value of <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfenced separators="|"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></mfenced></math> is less than that of <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfenced separators="|"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></mfenced></math>

<math><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">Δ</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></math> values of <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfenced separators="|"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></mfenced></math> and <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mfenced separators="|"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></mfenced></math> are calculated from the energies violet and yellow light, respectively.
Both absorb energies corresponding to their complementary colors.

solution.text:
Δ 0 A < Δ 0 B, both complexes have CN=6, B has strong field ligand and A has weak field ligand

so Δ 0 A < Δ 0 B

In both complexes, Cr has 3 unpaired electrons and hence, will be paramagnetic CrH2OCl3

Cr+3=1S2  2S2  2p6 3S2 3p6  3d3 in strong field ligand or weak field ligand is t2g111,ego



Δ0 order will be compared by spectrochemical series not by energies of violet and yellow light. Hence incorrect
